availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Montgomery County, Ohio, laborer and attorney. Indiana native. Son of Mary Boltin. Laborer in Montgomery County, Ohio, in 1850. Attorney in Montgomery County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Montgomery County, Miami, p. 25B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Montgomery County, Miamisburg, p. 133.
"Cornelius Boltin (1826-1906)," Find A Grave, Memorial 75339480, accessed May 1, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/75339480.
